Title: The Visitors: Bastille Day
Writer: Christian Clavier (adaptation), Christian Clavier (dialogue), Christian Clavier (screenplay), Jean-Marie Poiré (adaptation), Jean-Marie Poiré (dialogue), Jean-Marie Poiré (screenplay)
Actors: Christian Clavier, Jean Reno, Franck Dubosc, Karin Viard
Plot: Knight Godefroy de Montmirail and squire Jacquouille are stranded in 1793. Using trickery to break free from their shackles, both perilously partake in the Montmirail family's run away in the quest for an exiting time-shift.
